name: Forum Nachhaltige Geldanlagen
goal: Forum Nachhaltige Geldanlagen (FNG), founded in 2001, is the industry association promoting sustainable investment in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. It has over 190 corporate members, including banks, investment management companies, insurance companies, rating agencies, investment companies, asset managers, financial advisers, research institutions and NGOs, and around 30 individual members.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Communication, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment
euInitiatives:
HLEG on Sustainable Finance and all other legislative measures and projects with regard to Sustainable Finance in the EU (e.g. CSR-directive-Review, Directives IORPII and Shareholder Rights, ESA-Review, PRIIPS)
Implementation of EU Action Plan on Sustainable Finance
